eu_initiatives: Our meeting with the EU officials concerns the EU's cybersecurity strategy in the context of healthcare. Our vision is to assist the EU in its aims within the context of cybersecurity and health IT strategy within healthcare.
goals__remit:
The provision of health IT and cybersecurity consulting for vendors, local healthcare institutions and governmental organisations. Our team of clinicians provides end to end consulting around health IT and cybersecurity products and services within healthcare. 
 
Our goals are to continue to work with organisations, driving forward the uptake and benefits of technology in healthcare, leading to improved patient outcomes across the European continent
relevant_communication: We will be attending a meeting with the Director for Consumers at the Directorate-General for Justice and Consumers, with a view to discussing the health IT and cybersecurity strategy of the EU within the context of healthcare.
